text: Albert Robert Morgan (born 2 February 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for club Charlton Athletic. ==Career== Born in Rochester, Morgan joined Charlton Athletic at a young age and signed his first professional contract in May 2018. Following his promotion to the first-team squad, Morgan made his Charlton debut during their EFL Cup tie against AFC Wimbledon, featuring for the entire 90 minutes in the 2–2 draw. On 10 October 2019, Morgan joined Ebbsfleet United on an initial 28-day loan.
